stateDiagram

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

FREEZE

FREEZE : FREEZE

FREEZE : enter / #123; UpdateAnimation("")#59; #125;

MOVE_TO_TARGET

MOVE_TO_TARGET : MOVE_TO_TARGET

MOVE_TO_TARGET : enter / #123; UpdateAnimation("Running")#59; #125;

MOVE_TO_TARGET : do / #123; MoveTowardTarget()#59; #125;

GET_NEW_TARGET

GET_NEW_TARGET : GET_NEW_TARGET

GET_NEW_TARGET : enter / #123; RotateToTarget()#59; #125;

ROOT.(InitialState) --> FREEZE

FREEZE --> MOVE_TO_TARGET : do

MOVE_TO_TARGET --> GET_NEW_TARGET : do [IsTargetReached]

GET_NEW_TARGET --> MOVE_TO_TARGET : do
Events
settings
